definition.original_argsstring_html: (const char *name, const TType fieldType, const int16_t fieldId)

description.detailed_html: Write a field header containing the field id and field type. If the difference between the current field id and the last one is small (< 15), then the field id will be encoded in the 4 MSB as a delta. Otherwise, the field id will follow the type header as a zigzag varint.

brief_html: Write a field header containing the field id and field type. If the difference between the current field id and the last one is small (< 15), then the field id will be encoded in the 4 MSB as a delta. Otherwise, the field id will follow the type header as a zigzag varint.
